name: CloudAStructure Inc
description: Developer of cloud video surveillance systems designed to protect businesses of all sizes. The company's computer vision artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies allow to access and monitor surveillance data in real-time and can be customized as per need and deployed securely across required areas of coverage, enabling clients to protect their assets virtually paired with remote guarding service, cloud structure offers unparalleled cost-effective security for our customers.
one_liner: Developer of cloud video surveillance systems designed to protect businesses of all sizes. The company's computer vision artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies allow to access and monitor surveillance data in real-time and can be customized as per need and deployed securely across required areas of coverage, enabling clients to protect their assets virtually paired with remote guarding service, cloud structure offers unparalleled cost-effective security for our customers.
